comment.author: 92602305@N04
comment._content: Is Koolberin the name of the farm or location?  I can't find any location called Koolberin or similar in WA, apart from Koolberrin Road, South Kumminin.

comment.author: 33364206@N05
comment._content: trove.nla.gov.au/ndp/del/article/41702657?searchTerm=Kool... Seems like Koolberrin and Kumminin are near Bruce Rock.
